d.name: Paum
d.phase: You are facing a Dorogon. Even though it seems much larger than a man or someone from Arboris, it seems smaller than the average Dorogon. It seems to want to talk to you.
[Good day young Dinoz master.] [Its been a long time since we've seen your likes on Nimbao...] [I see Monsigneur Pistachio likes to surround himself with the most astonishing creatures.]
You head away from Paum, he doesn't seem to be bothering with you any more anyway. Everyone who lives in the towns nearby the city above seem to live a tranquil existence.

[You want to help me out?] [Your servant is intriguing Pistachio, I happily accept your proposition. I will give you a point of wisdom if you bring me a floral bouquet made up of ingredients from the surface. I'll certainly stand out from the crowd with a bouquet like that.]
d.a: Here's what you need to make a beautiful bouquet!
Here's what you need to make a beautiful bouquet!
I'll return with flowers from the surface!
d.phase: [Sadiquae, Orchids, excellent thinking!] [Yeah, but it's just not quite complete yet, it needs more to give it real impact!] [I'm really looking forward to getting the rest!]

[Sadiquae, Orchids, what a good idea, this bouquet will be awesome.] [I'd be a certainty to win her heart with this bouquet if only there more Flaureolae, around thirty should do the trick!] [I can't wait for you to deliver the finished bouquet!]
[Hahaha, don't panic, I've already got all the Flaureolae I need. You have earned your point of wisdom!] [All I need to do now is muster up the courage and go see her!]
You will need a special flower to win the trust of the Dorogon.
You have earned another point of wisdom - that makes two! Only three left to go!

d.name: Paum
d.phase: What happiness... since the Arborians were liberated, and the borders were opened, the exporting of our precious resources has been hugely successful. What brings you here Dinoz master?
